mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA ( ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , CRT_DATE , MDF_DATE , FILE_NAME , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , ISSECRETE , SECRETE_POST_PASSWORD , EMAIL ) VALUES ( 'QNA-' + TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') + '-' + LPAD(QNA_SEQ_ID.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{subject} , #{content} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , '' , '' , 'N' , '' , #{email} )
